mods.abstract: Female child, celluloid head, composition body, dark brown short wig, open mouth with two teeth, sleeping glass eyes, swivel neck, jointed at shoulders and hips, bare foot, ivory color flat hat with ribbon tape, white underdress with crochet trimmed lace, short yellow dress with decorating tape. Accompanying information describes that the doll is only named as 'Modern doll' then said the U.S. is leading all countries in the production of dolls. All,hand and machine-made.
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.
